Reviews.Title: The best phone I have ever had!
Reviews.Author: K. Tarvis
Reviews.Content: Ive had a sidekick LX since I first signed up for T-Mobile two years ago. Its awesome! Easy to text, IM, email, take pictures, keep notes, ringtones, and web! I love it, it is literally a sidekick and never leaves my side!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Thomas E. Jones
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying using my new. It came faster then I thought in would I will tell my friends about your company.

Reviews.Title: came fast
Reviews.Author: radiyat
Reviews.Content: they said it should come between the 25th and the 30th and it came on the 25th looks like its brand new i love flipping it its amazing

Reviews.Title: my sidekick LX
Reviews.Author: Misha Snyder
Reviews.Content: .i do like this phone but it already had restarted its self on me and erased all my contacts and notes and that made me a but angry. but for the phone all together...i'd like it to have internet and that is really the only complaint i really have. but i love it and i dont see myself getting red of it anytime soon.

Reviews.Title: old fashion style
Reviews.Author: Dianna Karega "poli sci me"
Reviews.Content: The item was in good condition, except for the battery. This item lights up and the keyboard was easy to use and the picture was clear. The only thing I wish I knew before ordering this item is what unlocked really meant.  Some of the features work but not all of them even if you are on the same network that the phone was locked on.

Reviews.Title: Unusual but good
Reviews.Author: AllenWrenches
Reviews.Content: They are out of this color. I bought the espresso brown phone and they sent me the carbon colored one.
